EmailTemplate.name: WC-2016-07-Cloud Cost Calculator.EMAIL-Promotion Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud Cost Compare | Find the Right Cloud at the Right Price
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://c3.turbonomic.com/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=c3&utm_content=10272016]]> Hi {{Lead.First Name:default=}}, Turbonomic is excited to introduce Cloud Cost Compare (C3)! C3 provides you with real-time decisions trading off public cloud performance and cost. Simply profile your app workload and the service decides on the best cloud and template. Click below and see how C3:
- Solves for the performance and cost tradeoff - Provides real-time placement decisions - Is cloud agnostic - Is free!
It’s a multi-cloud world and we’ve got you covered!
<[[https://c3.turbonomic.com/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=c3&utm_content=10272016]]> -The Turbonomic Team
